https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/6E7mJ5wpzTFbYFbJvTzzZ8Til9C.jpg Upon his release from a mental hospital following a nervous breakdown, the directionless Anthony joins his friend Dignan, who seems far less sane than the former. Dignan has hatched a hair-brained scheme for an as-yet-unspecified crime spree that somehow involves his former boss, the (supposedly) legendary Mr. Henry. Bottle Rocket
